conbody.p: To prepare a Windows VM image for use in Eucalyptus, follow the standard bundle/upload/register steps used for preparing Linux images , keeping in mind these differences:

ul.li: The filename of your Windows image must begin with the string windows. For example, windows.my2008server.img.
You don't use kernel and ramdisk images when you bundle a Windows image.
Bundling a Windows image can take several minutes, depending on the size of your image and the configuration of the machine on which you are running the bundling task.

conbody.note: Before you begin preparing an image, confirm that you have installed the latest version of Euca2ools client tools. If necessary, see your administrator for assistance.
